summary: Experienced Account Officer with a demonstrated history of working in the accounting industry. Skilled in Administration, English, Management, Microsoft Excel, and Project Management. Strong accounting professional with a Higher national diploma focused in Accounting from Imo State Polytechnic.

profile_positions.description:
-	 Assist customers to Check on the status of customer accounts and track checks and payments
-	Review and explain account charges
-	Assist banking customers who are victims of fraud, theft or identity theft
-	Assist customers with replacing lost or stolen credit or debit cards
-	Assist with address changes, customers instructions. 
-	Follow up on outstanding advances and assure timely reconciliation,
-	Ensure compliance with guidance to assure security, integrity and quality of enrichment processes,
- Answer questions about account types and banking products, such as  loans, credit cards fixed deposit,  various accounts packages and many more.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Officer

company.name: American Cancer Treatment & Research Center – Nigeria,

profile_positions.company: American Cancer Treatment & Research Center – Nigeria,
profile_positions.description:
-	Documents financial transactions by entering account information.
-	Maintains accounting controls by preparing and recommending policies and procedures.
-	Guides accounting clerical staff by coordinating activities and answering questions.
-	Reconciles financial discrepancies by collecting and analyzing account information.
-	Maintains financial security by following internal controls.
-	Prepares payments by verifying documentation, and requesting disbursements.
-	Answers accounting procedure questions by researching and interpreting accounting policy and regulations.
-	Prepares special financial reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing account information and trends.
-	Maintains customer confidence and protects operations by keeping financial information confidential.
-	Maintains professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops; reviewing professional publications; establishing personal networks; participating in professional societies.
-	Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed. 
-	Carryout stock count on a monthly basis and render appropriate report to management.
-	Reconcile Insta figures with physical cash and total revenue generated daily.
profile_positions.title: Account Officer

company.name: ICE logistics & Trade Solution Nigeria Ltd,

profile_positions.company: ICE logistics & Trade Solution Nigeria Ltd,
profile_positions.description:
Maintain financial records for by analyzing revenue and general ledger accounts. 
Reconcile bank statements by comparing transactions to the general ledger.
Assist with day-to-day operations of account, including filing, report generation, budget review, etc. 
Process weekly payroll accurately and timely. 
Maintain accounting documents and records, ensuring all files are up to date. 
Prepare bank deposits.
Working with journals, sales & purchase ledgers and spreadsheets.
Management of petty cash transactions.
Maintaining filing systems, generating reports, ordering supplies
Completeness, accuracy, and validity of transactions with support from other departments.
Accurate reconciliation of stores inventory and sales cash. 
Prompt reporting leading to informed decision by the management
profile_positions.title: Project Accounts Assistant

profile_positions.company: Industrial Training Fund, Staff School, Jos Plateau State
profile_positions.description:
Established and maintained an effective system for analyzing and reporting on operations
Writing of cash book, Revenue income and petty cash Vouchers
Maintaining documents and records to ensure all files are kept up to date.
Preparation of various financial documents
Reconcile bank statements by comparing transactions to the general ledger.
Writing of students receipt, contractors receipt.
And also, impacting of knowledge to the student on social studies.
profile_positions.title: Account Assistant,

profile_positions.description:
Receive cash  from customers and ensure necessary accounting entries with minimal error .
Ensuring no loss of income to the company by checkmating income leakage .
Attending to customers enquires, queries and requests .
Customer interface and conflict resolution .
Compile and maintain nonmonetary reports and records .
Compute and record total of transactions .
Keep periodic balance sheets of amounts and numbers of transactions
profile_positions.title: Account Assistant (Industrial Training)
